field1: put in helpful info for field1
help:
This API call is used to convert any input string to hexadecimal value. Converting a string to hexadecimal provides a single long alphanumerical string. The example shows if we convert a small example of HTML code to hexadecimal using API call what it would look like: > Example string (HTML Code): ```text Home Page

Hello World

This is test.

``` > HTTP API call example for converting to hexadecimal: ```text http://127.0.0.1:7778/api/hash/hex?message=%3Chtml%3E%3Chead%3E%3Ctitle%3EHome+Page%3C%2Ftitle%3E%3C%2Fhead%3E%3Cbody%3E%3Ch1%3EHello+World%3C%2Fh1%3E%3Cp%3EThis+is+test.%3C%2Fp%3E%3C%2Fbody%3E%3C%2Fhtml%3E ``` > End result: ```text { "result": "hash calculated", "message": "Home Page

Hello World

This is test.

", "hex": "3c68746d6c3e3c686561643e3c7469746c653e486f6d6520506167653c2f7469746c653e3c2f686561643e3c626f64793e3c68313e48656c6c6f20576f726c643c2f68313e3c703e5468697320697320746573742e3c2f703e3c2f626f64793e3c2f68746d6c3e00", "tag": "7729339918800585698" } ```
